sections.title: Your Crypto.org chain staking pool operator

features.title: Simple
features.image_alt: Get Crypto.org app for any devices
features.content: Start earn interests on your CRO with one tap. You can delegate to Libertas Staking from your mobile or pc.

features.title: Secure
features.content: Libertas is securing its stake pool with sentry nodes. We use Prometheus and Grafana to monitor our systems and get alerted of issues. All our servers are located in Europe.

features.title: Democratic
features.image_alt: Libertas is a democratic staking pool
features.content: Our fee is set at 5%. Libertas keeps fees low as possible to enable anyone to access the crypto world.

features.title: Keep in touch
features.content: Continue your Libertas experience on our Twitter account.

seo.description: Your Crypto.org chain staking pool operator
